definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with

sentences.english: To take charge of other assignments designated by the provincial government.
sentences.chinese: 承辦省政府交辦的其他事項。

sentences.english: To undertake other assignments designated by provincial government.
sentences.chinese: 承辦省政府交辦的其他事項。

sentences.english: To undertake other assignments designated by the autonomous region government.
sentences.chinese: 承辦自治區人民政府交辦的其他事項。

sentences.english: To undertake other tasks assigned by the leading Party group of the Ministry and Central Communist Youth League.
sentences.chinese: 承辦部黨組和團中央交辦的其他工作。

sentences.english: To undertake the other tasks as assigned by HeNan Entry-exit Inspection & Quarantine Bureau.
sentences.chinese: 承辦河南出入境檢驗檢疫局交辦的其他工作。

sentences.english: To undertake other works assigned by the prefectural commission and government.
sentences.chinese: 承辦州政府交辦的其他事項。

sentences.english: To undertake other works assigned by the municipal government.
sentences.chinese: 承辦市政府交辦的其他工作。

sentences.english: To undertake other assignments as designated by the district government.
sentences.chinese: 承辦區政府交辦的其他事項。

sentences.english: To undertake other assignments designated by the autonomous government.
sentences.chinese: 承辦自治區人民政府交辦的其他事項。

sentences.english: To undertake other assignments designated by the regional government and state commerce bureau.
sentences.chinese: 承擔自治區人民政府和國家商務部交辦的其他事項。

sentences.english: To complete other tasks assigned by the Commission leaders.
sentences.chinese: 完成會領導交辦的其他事項。

sentences.english: Accomplish all kinds of tasks issued by the Provincial Trade Promotion Organization.
sentences.chinese: 完成省貿促會交辦的各類工作任務。

sentences.english: To overtake other tasks of the retired official affairs assigned by the Office leaders.
sentences.chinese: 承擔部領導交辦的其它有關離退休幹部工作的事宜。

sentences.english: Develop and expand new customer resources and fulfill other assignments from higher-up.
sentences.chinese: 新客戶的拓展與開發及上司交辦的其他工作。

sentences.english: To undertake other assignments designated by prefectural government.
sentences.chinese: 承辦州政府交辦的其他事項。

sentences.english: To undertake other works assigned by the district government.
sentences.chinese: 承辦區政府交辦的其他事項。

definition: Kanting township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
internal affairs/domestic affairs/family affairs/(trad.) affairs within the palace
administrative unit (e.g. province 省[sheng3], prefecture 地區|地区[di4 qu1] or county 縣|县[xian4])
Taixi or Taihsi township in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan
